Title: The Metal Clan
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, P.J. Byrne, Anne Heche
Plot: Korra, Mako, Bolin and Asami visit Sao Fu, the city of Metal Clan. Lin does not want to meet her past. Suyin tells her life story. Air Temple Island training camp has a new recruit.
